attributes.action: To increase custodial sentence  for assault on emergency service workers
attributes.additional_details: The law is lax and not coinciding with seriousness of assault on our nurses doctors paramedics and police offices and firemen our brave workers are facing day in and day out either physical and or verbal assault which is unacceptable and needs to be dealt with via strong legislation custodial sentencing
attributes.background: The government to change law  that the minimum for attacking emergency worker should be two years and maximum five

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Minimum 2 year prison sentence for attacks on emergency workers
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550320

Introduce minimum sentences for attacks on emergency workers.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549032
